RowFile Class Reference

Class for reading line oriented files and parsing them out into vectors of strings easily. More...

Detailed Description

Class for reading line oriented files and parsing them out into vectors of strings easily.

RowFile

bool RowFile::nextCStringRowExpect ( std::vector< const char * > &  words,
unsigned int  expect 
)

Chop the next row into words and return them in the vector squawk and die if expected number was different from number found. char * memory in vector is owned elsewhere and will change after an calls to nextRow or nextLine.

Parameters:
words - vector to fill in with words.
expect - number of words that should be in next row.
Returns:
bool - false at EOF true otherwise.
